name: Cylab
description:
Cylab: You play as a character who has been wrongfully imprisoned and experimented on by a sinister organization. You have to steal a syringe that will give you new powers and use them to save the humanity outside the laboratory.

Game developed with UE5 and built for Windows.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Dash: Left Shift/Maiusc

Jump: Spacebar

Reset: R

Quit: ESC

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
